original_text: But I will only speak about the work that Christ has made me able to do. I have lived among the Gentiles and I have spoken God's message to them. They have obeyed God as a result of Christ's work through me. But I will only speak about the work that Christ has made me able to do. They have obeyed God as a result of Christ's work through me.
korean_text: 그리스도께서 이방인들을 순종하게 하기 위하여 나를 통하여 역사하신 것 외에는 내가 감히 말하지 아니하노라 그 일은 말과 행위로

sentences.original_text: But I will only speak about the work
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 오직 그 일에 대해서만 말하겠습니다

sentences.original_text: that Christ has made me able to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도께서 내가 할 수 있게 하신 일을

sentences.original_text: I have lived among the Gentiles
and I have spoken God's message to them
as a result of Christ's work through me
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 통해 역사하신 그리스도의 일 덕분에
